description: Try our easy to follow Blueberry & Apple Pie recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Berry pie & tart,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Blueberry,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,High fibre,Soy free,Vegetarian,Apple,Peanut free
name: Blueberry & Apple Pie Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Line base of a 20cm springform tin with baking paper.

Place flour, sugar and 1 teaspoon of cinnamon into a food processor. Process until combined. Add butter and process until crumbed. Transfer 1 cup of mixture to a small bowl and reserve. Press the remainder evenly over base and 3cm up side of tin. Chill while preparing filling.
Peel, core and finely slice apples straight into a bowl, adding lemon juice in intervals to prevent browning. Add remaining cinnamon and blueberries and stir well to combine.

Layer apple and blueberries into the pie crust, pressing down firmly. Crumble reserved dough mixture with almonds. Scatter dough mixture over the top of the filling. Place onto a large baking tray and bake pie for 1 hour and 10 minutes or until golden brown and apple is tender. Cool in tin. Serve.
